meanings.definition: of or relating to a dance or dancing
meanings.sent1: The choreal performance was graceful and elegant.
meanings.sent2: She wore a beautiful choreal dress for the dance recital.
meanings.sent3: The choreal music made everyone want to get up and dance.
meanings.sent4: The choreal movements of the ballet dancers were like poetry in motion.
meanings.sent5: The choreal routine left a lasting impression on the audience.

meanings.definition: a type of dance characterized by rhythmic movement and coordination of the body
meanings.sent1: The traditional choreal involved intricate footwork and hand gestures.
meanings.sent2: The dancers practiced the choreal routine tirelessly to perfect their performance.
meanings.sent3: The choreal competition brought out the best in all the participants.
meanings.sent4: The choreal of the indigenous tribe was a celebration of their culture.
meanings.sent5: The choreal was a fusion of modern and traditional dance styles.

meanings.definition: a group of dancers performing together
meanings.sent1: The choreal on stage captivated the audience with their synchronized movements.
meanings.sent2: The choreal rehearsed for hours to synchronize their steps perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The choreal of young children brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent4: The choreal of professionals showcased their talent and coordination.
meanings.sent5: The choreal received a standing ovation for their outstanding performance.
